Top-3 Similar Questions: su_1113454: Execute multiple commands in a terminal window from bash
Top-3 Scripts:
su_1113454: tmpScript=$(mktemp -u) || { echo "tmp file generation error!"; exit 1; }
echo '#!/bin/bash' > $tmpScript
echo "echo 'Hello' && sleep 5" >> $tmpScript
chmod +x $tmpScript
lxterminal -e "$tmpScript"
